extension.name: ETL particle G5 FSS v1.3
extension.author: Bertrand Pascal - En Toutes Lettres
extension.description:
Particle "FSS javascript" for Gantry 5.5 v1.3 - Template Hydrogen

FLAT SURFACE SHADER javascript is a collaborative effort between Matthew Wagerfield and Tobias van Schneider

Adaptation for Hydrogen by En Toutes Lettres (https://www.en-toutes-lettres.fr)

Compatible Joomla 4!

For french version, in your folder "/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/particles"
rename file "etl_particle-fss.yaml" to "etl_particle-fss_EN.yaml"
rename file "etl_particle-fss_FR.yaml" to "etl_particle-fss.yaml"


Don't forget to add these 2 lines

@import 'dependencies';

@import 'etl_particle-fss';

in your custom SCSS file, custom.scss (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)

or create this file and add these 2 lines with your text editor (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)
